name: dereuromark/cakephp-queue
description: The Queue plugin for CakePHP provides deferred task execution.

suggest.friendsofcake/search: For admin backend and filtering of current jobs.
suggest.dereuromark/cakephp-tools: For the QueueEmailTask (if you don't write your own task here). Also for admin backend.
suggest.dereuromark/cakephp-ide-helper: For maximum IDE support, especially around createJob() usage.

scripts.stan-setup: cp composer.json composer.backup && composer require --dev phpstan/phpstan:^0.12 && mv composer.backup composer.json
scripts.test-setup: [ ! -f phpunit.phar ] && wget https://phar.phpunit.de/phpunit-8.5.15.phar && mv phpunit-8.5.15.phar phpunit.phar || true
scripts.test-setup-9: [ ! -f phpunit.phar ] && wget https://phar.phpunit.de/phpunit-9.5.4.phar && mv phpunit-9.5.4.phar phpunit.phar || true
